Articles.Content: Apologies if this is something that\'s already been done, but I just read that a moderately recent update (0.14.2?) put trees into the terrain. I\'m not seeing them in 0.15.1. What gives? Were they taken out again or something, or do I need to have a box ticked which I don\'t?

The trees and rocks are terrain scatter items, they can be turned on and off.

The option is called 'Terrain Scatters (WIP)' in the graphics settings and is off by default in .15.
